name: Lucas and the Power of Musically
name_original: Lucas and the Power of Musically
description:
Take the role as Lucas, an amazing up and coming influencer who is taking Musically by storm. But with every famous person comes haters. You now need to dab your way through the haters in this platformer to be able to attend your meet and greets with your fans. But can you do it before you are defamed!?

Lucas and the Power of Musically was made as a highschool project. The game was made December 2017 in Gamemaker studio. The team included Mattias "Mau" Lundell, Rick Åström and Felicia Eriksson.
